thread.title: Rosie O’Donnell Urges Melania Trump To Divorce The President And ‘Flee’
thread.title_full: Rosie O’Donnell Urges Melania Trump To Divorce The President And ‘Flee’

author: Randy DeSoto
title: Rosie O’Donnell Urges Melania Trump To Divorce The President And ‘Flee’
text:
O’Donnell tweeted back, “Which is y u need to divorce him. Take ur son n parents and FLEE.” @FLOTUS – which is y u need to divorce him – take ur son n parents and FLEE 
The message is just the latest salvo that the comedian has fired at the 45th president and his family. Advertisement - story continues below 
O’Donnell headlined a protest across from the White House late last month on the night Trump addressed a joint session of Congress for the first time. 
“This is not Russia!” O’Donnell yelled out to the crowd gathered in Lafayette Park. “To Donald Trump and his pathetic band of white, privileged criminal businessmen, I would like to say to him, ‘Nyet, sir! Nyet! Nyet!…The game is over.” 
In January, O’Donnell tweeted that Trump is “mentally unstable” and must be stopped before taking office. 
In November, she promoted a video on Twitter claiming that the first couple’s son Barron was autistic, for which she later apologized to Melania after the creator of the video pulled it down and did the same. Advertisement - story continues below
